configItem.name: pc104alt
configItem.description: Generic 104-key PC with L-shaped Enter key

configItem.name: btc9116u
configItem.description: BTC 9116U Mini Wireless Internet and Gaming

configItem.name: logitech_g15
configItem.description: Logitech G15 extra keys via G15daemon

configItem.name: logiinkseusb
configItem.description: Logitech iTouch Internet Navigator SE USB

configItem.name: altgr-pinyin
configItem.description: Hanyu Pinyin Letters (with AltGr dead keys)

configItem.name: dvorak_quotes
configItem.description: Polish (Dvorak, with Polish quotes on quotemark key)

configItem.name: dvorak_altquotes
configItem.description: Polish (Dvorak, with Polish quotes on key 1)

configItem.name: ast
configItem.description: Asturian (Spain, with bottom-dot H and L)

configItem.name: grp:caps_switch
configItem.description: Caps Lock (while pressed), Alt+Caps Lock for the original Caps Lock action

configItem.name: grp:caps_select
configItem.description: Caps Lock to first layout; Shift+Caps Lock to second layout

configItem.name: grp:win_menu_select
configItem.description: Left Win to first layout; Right Win/Menu to second layout

configItem.name: grp:ctrl_select
configItem.description: Left Ctrl to first layout; Right Ctrl to second layout

configItem.name: grp:alt_altgr_toggle
configItem.description: Both Alts together; AltGr alone chooses third level

configItem.name: grp:lctrl_lwin_rctrl_menu
configItem.description: Ctrl+Left Win to first layout; Ctrl+Menu to second layout

configItem.name: lv3:ralt_switch_multikey
configItem.description: Right Alt; Shift+Right Alt as Compose

configItem.name: lv3:caps_switch_latch
configItem.description: Caps Lock; acts as onetime lock when pressed together with another 3rd-level chooser

configItem.name: lv3:bksl_switch_latch
configItem.description: Backslash; acts as onetime lock when pressed together with another 3rd level chooser

configItem.name: lv3:lsgt_switch_latch
configItem.description: The "< >" key; acts as onetime lock when pressed together with another 3rd level chooser

configItem.name: ctrl:hyper_capscontrol
configItem.description: Caps Lock as Ctrl, Ctrl as Hyper

configItem.name: ctrl:swap_lalt_lctl
configItem.description: Swap Left Alt with Left Ctrl

configItem.name: ctrl:swap_ralt_rctl
configItem.description: Swap Right Alt with Right Ctrl

configItem.name: ctrl:swap_lwin_lctl
configItem.description: Swap Left Win with Left Ctrl

configItem.name: ctrl:swap_rwin_rctl
configItem.description: Swap Right Win with Right Ctrl

configItem.name: ctrl:swap_lalt_lctl_lwin
configItem.description: Left Alt as Ctrl, Left Ctrl as Win, Left Win as Left Alt

configItem.name: grp_led
configItem.description: Use keyboard LED to show alternative layout

configItem.name: mod_led
configItem.description: Use keyboard LED to indicate modifiers

configItem.name: keypad:future
configItem.description: Unicode arrows and math operators on default level

configItem.name: keypad:oss_wang
configItem.description: Wang 724 keypad with Unicode arrows and math operators

configItem.name: keypad:future_wang
configItem.description: Wang 724 keypad with Unicode arrows and math operators on default level

configItem.name: kpdl:dotoss_latin9
configItem.description: Four-level key with dot, Latin-9 only

configItem.name: caps:internal
configItem.description: Caps Lock uses internal capitalization; Shift "pauses" Caps Lock

configItem.name: caps:internal_nocancel
configItem.description: Caps Lock uses internal capitalization; Shift does not affect Caps Lock

configItem.name: caps:shift
configItem.description: Caps Lock acts as Shift with locking; Shift "pauses" Caps Lock

configItem.name: caps:shift_nocancel
configItem.description: Caps Lock acts as Shift with locking; Shift does not affect Caps Lock

configItem.name: caps:capslock
configItem.description: Caps Lock toggles normal capitalization of alphabetic characters

configItem.name: caps:shiftlock
configItem.description: Caps Lock toggles Shift Lock (affects all keys)

configItem.name: caps:escape
configItem.description: Make Caps Lock an additional Esc

configItem.name: caps:escape_shifted_capslock
configItem.description: Make Caps Lock an additional Esc, but Shift + Caps Lock is the regular Caps Lock

configItem.name: caps:backspace
configItem.description: Make Caps Lock an additional Backspace

configItem.name: caps:super
configItem.description: Make Caps Lock an additional Super

configItem.name: caps:hyper
configItem.description: Make Caps Lock an additional Hyper

configItem.name: caps:menu
configItem.description: Make Caps Lock an additional Menu key

configItem.name: caps:numlock
configItem.description: Make Caps Lock an additional Num Lock

configItem.name: caps:ctrl_modifier
configItem.description: Make Caps Lock an additional Ctrl

configItem.name: altwin:menu
configItem.description: Add the standard behavior to Menu key

configItem.name: altwin:meta_alt
configItem.description: Alt and Meta are on Alt

configItem.name: altwin:alt_win
configItem.description: Alt is mapped to Win and the usual Alt

configItem.name: altwin:ctrl_win
configItem.description: Ctrl is mapped to Win and the usual Ctrl

configItem.name: altwin:ctrl_rwin
configItem.description: Ctrl is mapped to Right Win and the usual Ctrl

configItem.name: altwin:ctrl_alt_win
configItem.description: Ctrl is mapped to Alt, Alt to Win

configItem.name: altwin:left_meta_win
configItem.description: Meta is mapped to Left Win

configItem.name: altwin:alt_super_win
configItem.description: Alt is mapped to Right Win, Super to Menu

configItem.name: altwin:swap_lalt_lwin
configItem.description: Left Alt is swapped with Left Win

configItem.name: altwin:prtsc_rwin
configItem.description: Win is mapped to PrtSc and the usual Win

configItem.name: numpad:mac
configItem.description: Numeric keypad always enters digits (as in macOS)

configItem.name: numpad:microsoft
configItem.description: Num Lock on: digits; Shift for arrows. Num Lock off: arrows (as in Windows)

configItem.name: numpad:shift3
configItem.description: Shift does not cancel Num Lock, chooses 3rd level instead

configItem.name: srvrkeys:none
configItem.description: Special keys (Ctrl+Alt+<key>) handled in a server

configItem.name: apple:alupckeys
configItem.description: Apple Aluminium emulates Pause, PrtSc, Scroll Lock

configItem.name: apple:jp_oadg109a
configItem.description: Japanese Apple keyboards emulate OADG109A backslash

configItem.name: apple:jp_pc106
configItem.description: Japanese Apple keyboards emulate PC106 backslash

configItem.name: shift:both_capslock
configItem.description: Both Shifts together enable Caps Lock

configItem.name: shift:both_capslock_cancel
configItem.description: Both Shifts together enable Caps Lock; one Shift key disables it

configItem.name: shift:both_shiftlock
configItem.description: Both Shifts together enable Shift Lock

configItem.name: grab:break_actions
configItem.description: Allow breaking grabs with keyboard actions (warning: security risk)

configItem.name: grab:debug
configItem.description: Allow grab and window tree logging

configItem.name: lv5:lsgt_switch_lock
configItem.description: The "< >" key chooses 5th level and acts as a one-time lock if pressed with another 5th level chooser

configItem.name: lv5:ralt_switch_lock
configItem.description: Right Alt chooses 5th level and acts as a one-time lock if pressed with another 5th level chooser

configItem.name: lv5:lwin_switch_lock
configItem.description: Left Win chooses 5th level and acts as a one-time lock if pressed with another 5th level chooser

configItem.name: lv5:rwin_switch_lock
configItem.description: Right Win chooses 5th level and acts as a one-time lock if pressed with another 5th level chooser

configItem.name: nbsp:level3n
configItem.description: Non-breaking space at the 3rd level, thin non-breaking space at the 4th level

configItem.name: nbsp:level4n
configItem.description: Non-breaking space at the 4th level, thin non-breaking space at the 6th level

configItem.name: nbsp:level4nl
configItem.description: Non-breaking space at the 4th level, thin non-breaking space at the 6th level (via Ctrl+Shift)

configItem.name: nbsp:zwnj2zwj3
configItem.description: Zero-width non-joiner at the 2nd level, zero-width joiner at the 3rd level

configItem.name: nbsp:zwnj2zwj3nb4
configItem.description: Zero-width non-joiner at the 2nd level, zero-width joiner at the 3rd level, non-breaking space at the 4th level

configItem.name: nbsp:zwnj2nb3
configItem.description: Zero-width non-joiner at the 2nd level, non-breaking space at the 3rd level

configItem.name: nbsp:zwnj2nb3zwj4
configItem.description: Zero-width non-joiner at the 2nd level, non-breaking space at the 3rd level, zero-width joiner at the 4th level

configItem.name: nbsp:zwnj2nb3nnb4
configItem.description: Zero-width non-joiner at the 2nd level, non-breaking space at the 3rd level, thin non-breaking space at the 4th level

configItem.name: nbsp:zwnj3zwj4
configItem.description: Zero-width non-joiner at the 3rd level, zero-width joiner at the 4th level

configItem.name: japan:hztg_escape
configItem.description: Make Zenkaku Hankaku an additional Esc

configItem.name: korean:ralt_hangul
configItem.description: Make right Alt a Hangul key

configItem.name: korean:rctrl_hangul
configItem.description: Make right Ctrl a Hangul key

configItem.name: korean:ralt_hanja
configItem.description: Make right Alt a Hanja key

configItem.name: korean:rctrl_hanja
configItem.description: Make right Ctrl a Hanja key

configItem.name: esperanto:qwerty
configItem.description: At the corresponding key in a QWERTY layout

configItem.name: esperanto:dvorak
configItem.description: At the corresponding key in a Dvorak layout

configItem.name: esperanto:colemak
configItem.description: At the corresponding key in a Colemak layout

configItem.name: terminate
configItem.description: Key sequence to kill the X server
